metadata.title: CVE-2024-50173 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/panthor: Fix access to uninitialized variable in tick_ctx_cleanup()The group variable can't be used to retrieve ptdev in our second loop,because it points to the previously iterated list_head, not a validgroup. Get the ptdev object from the scheduler instead.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
